sentence.Network_en: Gear lubricants may congeal and channel in cold weather.
sentence.Network_cn: 天气冷时齿轮润滑油可能凝结而形成凹槽.

sentence.Network_en: The blood had started to congeal.
Water can congeal to be ice, sweat can congeal to be resplendence.
sentence.Network_cn: 人生格言水凝固成冰, 汗水凝固成辉煌!

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语单词的奥秘 - luozhong10的日志 - 网易博客 ... grume（ 凝块，血块，粘块）； congeal（ 凝结，冻结）； gum（ 树胶，胶浆）；.
字典中结字的解释 ... (4) 结束[ finish;end] (6) 凝结[ congeal] (8) 系;扎缚[ tie;bind].
confuse 使混乱congeal 凝聚,冻僵congenial 意气相投,友善的.
新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... confound ? v. 混淆 congeal ? v. 凝固 congenial ? adj. 温和的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French congeler, from Latin congelare, from con- 'together' + gelare 'freeze' (from gelu 'frost')

entry.def: When a liquid congeals, it becomes very thick and sticky and almost solid.

example.ex: The blood had started to congeal.

example.tran: 洒出来的酒混合着已变稠的汤

sentences.sentence: "the liquid jelled after we added the enzyme"
